Clickheat.PluginDescription: A visual heatmap of clicks on a HTML page, showing hot and cold click zones.
Clickheat.LOGIN_ERROR: Login error, wrong user or password
Clickheat.LAYOUT_LIQUID: Liquid content/menu (automatic adjusting to available space)
Clickheat.LAYOUT_2: Fixed centered content (automatic left and right margins)
Clickheat.LAYOUT_3: Fixed content stuck to the left (automatic right margin)
Clickheat.LAYOUT_5: Fixed left and right menus, liquid content
Clickheat.LAYOUT_6: Fixed content stuck to the right (automatic left margin)
Clickheat.LATEST_KO: Can not find dynamically the latest available version, yours is %s, the latest one read directly from Labsmedias website is
Clickheat.LATEST_OK: You have the latest available version (%s)
Clickheat.LATEST_NO: Your version (%s) is not the latest available one (%s). You can download the latest one on our website:
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_ADMIN_COOKIE:
In order to avoid pollution of your statistics,
you can choose not to log your own clicks

OK = log my clicks
Cancel = do not log my clicks
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT: Javascript code to be pasted on pages you want to study
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_IMAGE: Show ClickHeat logo on the studied page:
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_QUOTA: Maximum clicks per page and visitor, next clicks would not be saved (0 = no limit, 3 is a good choice)
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_SITE: Website name (allowed characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, underscore, hyphen, dot)
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_GROUP: Group name, to group similar pages for a simpler analysis
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_GROUP1: allowed characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, underscore, hyphen, dot
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_PASTE: Copy and paste the code below on your pages, just before the end of the page (before </body> tag):
Clickheat.JAVASCRIPT_DEBUG: Once the code pasted on your pages, do not forget to test if the code works correctly, by calling your page with the parameter ?debugclickheat. You should see a message showing the state of Clickheat.
Clickheat.NO_CLICK_BELOW: No clicks recorded beneath this line
Clickheat.ERROR_DATA: No logs for the selected period (first think removing filters: browser, screensize). _JAVASCRIPT_
Clickheat.ERROR_JAVASCRIPT: Did you correctly installed Javascript code on your webpages?
Clickheat.ERROR_FIXED: All widths are fixed, that is not possible. Please change one of your layout width above.
Clickheat.CHECK_NOT_WRITABLE: PHP has not got write permission in the configuration directory
Clickheat.CHECK_GD_IMG: imagecreatetruecolor() unavailable, can not create images (with good quality), check that GD is installed
Clickheat.CHECK_GD_ALPHA: imagecolorallocatealpha() unavailable, can not create transparent images (you can ignore this, but transparency is really recommended)
Clickheat.CHECK_GD_PNG: imagepng() unavailable, can not create PNG images, sorry
Clickheat.CHECKS_KO: One or more tests have failed. Please correct problems and refresh this page.
Clickheat.CONFIG_LOGPATH_DIR: Logfiles directory does not exist. Please create it
Clickheat.CONFIG_LOGPATH_KO: Logfiles directory does not have write permissions, please give it write permission for PHP user
Clickheat.CONFIG_CACHEPATH_DIR: Temporary files directory does not exist. Please create it
Clickheat.CONFIG_CACHEPATH_KO: Temporary files directory does not have write permissions, please give it write permission for PHP user
Clickheat.CONFIG_REFERERS: Domain names (separated by commas) allowed to log clicks on this server
Clickheat.CONFIG_GROUPS: Group names (separated by commas) allowed to log clicks on this server
Clickheat.CONFIG_FILESIZE: Maximum logfile size (in KB) of a group over a day (1000 clicks are about 25KB, 0 = no size limit)
Clickheat.CONFIG_MEMORY: Memory limit (default php.ini value: %dMB, limits: from %d to %dMB, but be careful with high values)
Clickheat.CONFIG_MEMORY_KO: please stay in the specified range
Clickheat.CONFIG_STEP: Clicks grouping by X*X pixels zones (speed up display of heatmaps)
Clickheat.CONFIG_STEP_KO: zones can not be under 1x1 pixels
Clickheat.CONFIG_DOT_KO: dot size can not be zero
Clickheat.CONFIG_PALETTE: If you see red squares on heatmaps check this box
Clickheat.CONFIG_YESTERDAY: Show yesterday statistics at start (rather than today)
Clickheat.CONFIG_FLUSH: Automatic flush of statistics older than X days (0 = keep all files, not recommended)
Clickheat.CONFIG_VIEWER_LOGIN: Visitors identifier (if empty, account is disabled)
Clickheat.CONFIG_LOGIN: identifier must be at least 4 characters
Clickheat.CLEANER_RUN: Cleaning finished: %d files and %d directories have been deleted
Clickheat.UPGRADE_NEXT: Check your configuration, then save it to finish upgrade
